deck.dropzone: Click or drag & drop to upload deck image
deck.neuronSupport: Supports images exported from Yu-Gi-Oh! Neuron
deck.structureDetectionFailed: Failed to detect deck structure. Please check image quality.
deck.analysisError: Failed to analyze deck structure. Please check image quality.

help.title: Help
help.cardMovementDescription: You can move cards to different zones by drag & drop.
help.cardMenuDescription: Long press on a card to open the menu:
help.undoDescription: Use 'Undo' button to cancel the previous operation. Use 'Redo' button to redo canceled operations.
help.cardStackingDescription: You can stack cards in Monster and Spell/Trap zones. Use the 'Stack at top/bottom' toggle to choose stacking order.
help.graveBanishDescription: Tap zone labels (Graveyard/Banished) to expand the zone for card selection.
help.exDeckDescription: Tap 'Extra Deck' label to expand and arrange cards for better visibility. You can add cards from other zones while expanded.
help.freeZoneDescription: The gray zone at the bottom left is a free zone for temporary card placement and organization.
help.tokenDescription: Use 'Generate Token' button to create tokens. Tokens are added to the free zone, up to 5 cards maximum.
help.random5DrawDescription: 'Random 5 Draw' resets to the state after deck loading, shuffles, then draws 5 cards.
help.gameResetDescription: Use 'Reset' button to return the game to its initial state.

goToReplay.title: Open Replay
goToReplay.description: Enter a replay ID to open a saved replay.

shareUrl.title: Share URL
shareUrl.shareDescription: Share this URL so others can view the replay.

autoPlay.title: Auto Play
autoPlay.description: Deck loaded. Auto play will start in {{count}} seconds

deckImageReplacer.title: Deck Image Replacer
deckImageReplacer.positionSelectionHelpText: Load a deck image to select replacement positions here

recordingConfirm.title: Overwrite Recording Confirmation
recordingConfirm.description: Existing replay data will be overwritten when you start a new recording. Do you want to continue?

resetConfirm.title: Reset Game State Confirmation
resetConfirm.description: This will reset the game state to right after deck loading. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?

tokenLimitError.title: Token Generation Error
tokenLimitError.description: The free zone already has 5 or more cards. Cannot generate more tokens.

drawWarning.title: 5 Draw Confirmation
drawWarning.description: Cards exist in zones other than hand, deck, and extra deck. Executing 5 draw will return all cards to deck, shuffle, and draw 5 cards. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
